mapper.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MI.MBER_INFO_IDX DESC) RNUM, MI.*, M.MBER_NAME FROM MBER M, MBER_INFO MI WHERE M.MBER_EMAIL = MI.MBER_EMAIL
mapper.select: AND M.MBER_DEL = 'N' AND MI.MBER_INFO_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY MI.MBER_INFO_IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MBER_TQ ( TQ_IDX, MBER_EMAIL, TQ_QUESTION, TQ_ANSWER, DEL_FLAG ) VALUES ( SEQ_MBER_TQ_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{EMAIL}, #{QUESTION}, #{ANSWER}, 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE MBER_TQ SET DEL_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE MBER_EMAIL = #{EMAIL}
mapper.select: SELECT MBER_NAME, MBER_IMG, MBER_INFO_IDX, MBER_SKILL, MBER_INTRODUCE, MI.MBER_EMAIL, SCORE FROM( SELECT MBER_EMAIL EMAIL, SCORE FROM (SELECT A.MBER_EMAIL ,SUM(B.SCORE) AS SCORE from MBER_TQ A JOIN (SELECT MBER_EMAIL, TQ_QUESTION, TQ_ANSWER, 1 SCORE FROM MBER_TQ WHERE MBER_EMAIL= #{EMAIL} AND DEL_FLAG = 'N') B ON A.TQ_QUESTION = B.TQ_QUESTION AND A.TQ_ANSWER = B.TQ_ANSWER AND A.MBER_EMAIL != #{EMAIL} AND DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND SCORE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.MBER_EMAIL ORDER BY SUM(B.SCORE) DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4) GENIE, MBER_INFO MI , MBER WHERE GENIE.EMAIL = MI.MBER_EMAIL AND MBER_INFO_DEL = 'N' AND MBER.MBER_EMAIL = MI.MBER_EMAIL ORDER BY GENIE.SCORE DESC
